detail_desc: Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Tailored trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, and side and back pockets. Straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy twill with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Imitation leather wallet with a zip around the top, five card slots and a zipped coin compartment. Lined. Size 2x10x11.5 cm.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Top in soft jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and a flounce at the cuffs and hem.
Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a round, ribbed neckline.
Trainers in glittery imitation leather with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a padded edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Shirt in a linen weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in patterned cotton jersey. Sleeveless top with a straight-cut neckline, frill-trimmed shoulder straps and a rounded hem. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist and frill-trimmed hems.
Shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.
Vest top in cotton jersey with worn details, a racer back, and raw edges around the neckline and armholes.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck at the front, triangular cups with removable inserts, and cut-out sections at the back and sides. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Aqua shoes in scuba fabric with elastication around the top, a loop at the back and textured rubber soles.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow ties at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Long, straight-cut coat in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, long sleeves, discreet side pockets and slits in the sides of the hem. Tie belt at the waist. No fasteners. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif at the top.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar and an opening with ties at the top. Long raglan balloon sleeves with a button at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. Lined.
Leggings in soft jersey with wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Knee-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, elastication at the back of the waist and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a faux fur pompom at the top and a sewn-in turn-up. Jersey lining.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in ribbed, leopard-print cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline.
Short, wide shorts in a viscose weave with a high, elasticated, frill-trimmed waist and side pockets.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Long top in airy wool jersey with extra-long sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck, buttons down the front and a tie detail at the hem.
Oversized blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, small stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Longer at the back.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Imitation suede mules with open toes, satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 3 cm. Covered block heel 11 cm.
Jumper in a cable knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend with short raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Fine-knit scarf with fringes on the short sides. Size 30x180 cm.
Short, straight-cut dress in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a gentle V-neck and narrow shoulder straps with decorative tie details at the top.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in cotton jersey. Printed top with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Shorts with an elasticated waist and contrasting colour seams.
Straight-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a detachable belt in braided imitation suede.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in printed, superstretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button and cut-off edge at the hem.
Satin skirt with an elasticated paper bag waist, tie belt and side pockets.
Wide, V-neck blouse in a patterned viscose weave with long sleeves with ties at the ends. Gently rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a shaped neckline that has gathers at the top and is elasticated at the back. Long sleeves with elastication at the top and cuffs, a seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Vest top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Thin metal hoop earrings with coin-shaped pendants. Diameter 2 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck. Slightly longer at the back.

Sleeveless dress in glittery tulle with flower-shaped appliqués in fabric containing glittery threads. V-neck and pearly buttons at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and a voluminous skirt in a double layer of tulle. Lined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft textured knit wool blend with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Flip-flops with glittery straps in thermoplastic polyurethane, a print motif, and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Short skirt in an airy, patterned weave with a frill-trimmed draped section at the front, and concealed zip at the back. Lined.

Calf-length, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a sheen and a small stand-up collar. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in a jacquard weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Fitted jersey top in a cotton blend with gathers front and back and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved blouse in satin with a small stand-up collar and concealed buttons down the front. Wide cuffs with a slit and button, and a rounded hem.

prod_name: Valentin Slim fit WD trs price
detail_desc: Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. Side pockets, a fake back pocket and legs with creases.
Treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake pockets at the front and real pockets at the back.
Sleeveless body in mesh with gathered elastication for a draped effect. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, press-studs at the crotch and a narrow cut at the back. Jersey lining.
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, diagonal zip at the front and side pockets. Ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with mesh at the back, mesh shoulder straps and a racer back.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-shaped opening at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with ties at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a flared, tiered, lined skirt.
Scarf in a soft, loose weave with fringe trims on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide, high-waisted shorts in woven fabric with a sewn-in tie belt and pleats at the top. Fly with a concealed zip, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Set with a bodysuit and pair of leggings in printed organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool. Slightly longer style with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, patch front pockets and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
3/4-length dungarees in washed cotton denim with adjustable straps that fasten at the front. Side pockets, a zip fly and wide, straight legs.
Short necklace with glass beads, small metal pendants and a metal fastener. Adjustable length approx. 40-48 cm.
Long-sleeved jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a glittery motif on the front and gathered frills over the shoulders.
